title: Expulsion of Jewish population from Spain

content.question: In addition to the conquest of the last Muslim outpost in Spain at Granada and Columbus' voyage to the Americas, which of the following occurred in 1492 ?

choices.label: Isabella of Castile married Ferdinand of Aragon.
The Spanish defeated the Turks at Lepanto.
The plague broke out in Spain.
The Jewish population was expelled from Spain.

content.answer: The Jewish population was expelled from Spain.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
